title: PBE
body: how do i play in the PBE? always when i try it says "Was Ziggs here? Something...blew up on this page. Please give it another shot later." i don't know why i can't, is they block it or something? i don't know..

replies.body: It might be attempting to sign up for the PBE via the NA region URL, but need to use the one for EUNE. You'll need to sign in from the [EUNE ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/)page first, then visit the PBE link. Log out entirely as your first step, then head over to the [EUNE ](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/)page. Once there, the EUNE PBE link should get this resolved. Hope that helps!
